title: Fight over e-commerce sales tax reaches U.S. high court
text:
Fight over e-commerce sales tax reaches U.S. high court   01:48 
A high-stakes showdown at the U.S. Supreme Court on Tuesday will determine whether states can force out-of-state online retailers to collect sales taxes in a fight between South Dakota and e-commerce businesses.   
A high-stakes showdown at the U.S. Supreme Court on Tuesday will determine whether states can force out-of-state online retailers to collect sales taxes in a fight between South Dakota and e-commerce businesses.  //reut.rs/2IY3mhP
